alert.note: Alert for St. Francois; Ste. Genevieve (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 05 at 2:29AM CDT until August 05 at 3:00AM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern Ste. Genevieve County in southeastern Missouri... Southeastern St. Francois County in southeastern Missouri... * Until 300 AM CDT. * At 229 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Coffman, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will remain over mainly rural areas of southeastern Ste. Genevieve and southeastern St. Francois Counties, including the following locations... River Aux Vases, Libertyville, and Minnith. This also includes Hawn State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
